events.message: We have successfully received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate, who has a strong background in backend development.
Candidate's application has been categorized under Engineering based on keywords including software, developer, and backend expertise mentioned in the resume.
The recruiting manager for Engineering has assigned a recruiter to handle the Software Engineer candidate’s application and arrange further steps.
Initial screening was conducted via phone call to assess the candidate’s technical knowledge and interest in the Software Engineer role.
The candidate responded promptly and positively, expressing enthusiasm about moving forward to the technical interview phase.
We have scheduled the technical interview for the Software Engineer position on May 7th at 10:00 AM, providing the candidate with all necessary details.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and knowledge of backend development technologies.
Following the positive technical results, the HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss cultural fit and compensation expectations.
